title: Hit and run
selftext: Today in Delhi, a reckless drunk driver attempted to flee after hitting a scooty. When stopped and confronted he turned aggressive and refused to cooperate. He even resorted to threats.
cleaned_text: hit run today delhi reckless drunk driver attempted flee hitting scooty stopped confronted turned aggressive refused cooperate even resorted threats
